# Readmissions in HED 
## NHS-R Community Conference 2020

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository holds my presentation for NHS-R Community Conference 2020, talking about case-mix adjustment, splines and generalised additive models, random-intercept model and a little of how they've been used in HED.


For more information, or support, contact [HED@uhb.nhs.uk](mailto:HED@uhb.nhs.uk) or [chris.mainey@uhb.nhs.uk](mailto:chris.mainey@uhb.nhs.uk)
